page.title: 09A UNEMPLOYED PERSON'S DAY
page.content: I FINISHED SCHOOL THREE YEARS AGO AND HAVE NOT HAD A PROPER JOB SINCE. AT THE MOMENT I AM ON THE DOLE, WHICH I GET EVERY THURSDAY. WHEN I LEFT SCHOOL I WENT ON SOME OF THE GOVERNMENT TRAINING SCHEMES, BUT WHEN YOU FINISH THESE THERE ARE NO JOBS TO GO TO. THERE ARE NO JOBS IN THE AREA, ESPECIALLY SINCE THE PIT CLOSED IN 1983. I NORMALLY GET UP LATE, USUALLY ABOUT DINNER TIME. AFTER DINNER I GO DOWN THE CAFE WITH SOME OF MY FRIENDS WHO ARE ALSO ON THE DOLE. IN THE CAFE WE TALK AND PLAY ON THE SPACE INVADERS. THE DAYS ARE BORING REALLY BECAUSE THERE IS NOTHING TO DO AND I HAVE LITTLE MONEY TO SPEND.
